Ingredients.6: 0.25 cup sugar and sucralose blend for baking (such as Natur® Bakers Blend)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly butter an 8-inch square baking pan.

Directions.2: Whisk flour and baking powder in a small bowl to remove any lumps.

Directions.3: Beat butter with white sugar, brown sugar, and sugar blend in a large bowl until well combined. Stir in egg and vanilla extract, beating until smooth. Add flour mixture and blend until just combined, taking care not to overbeat the batter.

Directions.4: Gently fold white chocolate chips, milk chocolate pieces, candy corn, and almonds into the batter. Spread batter into the prepared pan.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes. Let cool for at least 30 minutes before cutting into bars.
